text: Marathon Man is a 1976 American crime thriller movie. It stars Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. The movie is based on the novel of the same name and is set in New York City. It received strong critical and box office success. == Other websites == * Category:1976 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:French-language movies Category:German-language movies Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies about siblings Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Uruguay Category:Works about brothers Category:Movies directed by John Schlesinger Category:Movies about dentistry
title: Marathon Man
